endpoints.name: Create Stage Instance
endpoints.description:
Creates a new Stage instance associated to a Stage channel.
Requires the user to be a moderator of the Stage channel.

endpoints.name: Get Stage Instance
endpoints.description: Gets the stage instance associated with the Stage channel, if it exists.

endpoints.name: Modify Stage Instance
endpoints.description:
Updates fields of an existing Stage instance.
Requires the user to be a moderator of the Stage channel.

endpoints.name: Delete Stage Instance
endpoints.description:
Deletes the Stage instance.
Requires the user to be a moderator of the Stage channel.
